game.name: Atlas Falling
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Atlas Falling is an action RPG with roguelike elements in which the game world is forged as you battle to discover the truth. Experience endless gameplay from randomized skills, levels, and multiple upgrade paths.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Atlas Falling is an action RPG with roguelike elements in which the game world is forged as you battle to discover the truth. Experience endless gameplay from randomized skills, levels, and multiple upgrade paths.
